Package ohos.agp.components.listcomponent

Class Provider<E extends ComponentOwner>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.Provider<E>

  • public abstract class Provider<E extends ComponentOwner>
extends Object
    A base class that saves ListComponent data and sets up a relationship between the ComponentOwner and the ListComponent data.
    Since:
    7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static long INVALID_ID
      Indicates an invalid component ID in the ListComponent.

      Obtains the native object.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateComponentOwner

        public abstract E onCreateComponentOwner​(ListComponent parent,
                                         int componentType)
        Called when a ComponentOwner is created.

        You can create a ComponentOwner for the ListComponent based on the specified componentType.

        Parameters:
        parent - Indicates the ListComponent to which the new component, after being bound to the provider, will be added.
        componentType - Indicates the type of the new component.
        Returns:
        Returns the ComponentOwner.
        Since:
        7

      • getComponentOwner

        public final E getComponentOwner​(long componentOwnerPtr)
        Obtains the ComponentOwner corresponding to a native pointer.
        Parameters:
        componentOwnerPtr - Indicates the native pointer.
        Returns:
        Returns the ComponentOwner.
        Since:
        7

      • getItemComponent

        public final Component getItemComponent​(long componentPtr)
        Obtains the Component corresponding to a native pointer.
        Parameters:
        componentPtr - Indicates the native pointer.
        Returns:
        Returns the Component.
        Since:
        7

      • getItemNumber

        public abstract int getItemNumber​()
        Obtains the total number of components in the provider.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of components.
        Since:
        7

      • onBindComponentOwner

        public abstract void onBindComponentOwner​(E owner,
                                          int position)
        Called when a ComponentOwner is bound to a component.

        You can update the component effect of the ComponentOwner based on the updates to the component at the specified position.

        Parameters:
        owner - Indicates the ComponentOwner of the component.
        position - Indicates the position of the component in the provider's data set.
        Since:
        7

      • onBindComponentOwner

        public void onBindComponentOwner​(E owner,
                                 int position,
                                 List<Object> crabs)
        Called when a ComponentOwner is bound to a component.

        You can update the component effect of the ComponentOwner based on the updates to the component at the specified position. Partial update is supported.

        Parameters:
        owner - Indicates the ComponentOwner of the component.
        position - Indicates the position of the component in the provider's data set.
        crabs - Indicates the crabs. Data from the crabs in Provider#notifyItemChanged(int, Object) or Provider#notifyItemRangeChanged(int, int, Object) is the basis for providing the partial update feature.
        Since:
        7

      • getNativePtr

        public long getNativePtr​()
        Obtains the native object.
        Returns:
        Returns the native object.

      • setHasUniqueIdentifier

        public void setHasUniqueIdentifier​(boolean hasUniqueIdentifier)
        Sets whether each component in the data set can be represented by a unique identifier of the type Long.
        Parameters:
        hasUniqueIdentifier - Specifies whether each component in the data set has a unique identifier. The value true means that each component has a unique identifier, and false means the opposite.
        Since:
        7

      • hasUniqueIdentifier

        public final boolean hasUniqueIdentifier​()
        Checks whether each component in the provider has a unique identifier, ItemId.
        Returns:
        Returns true if each component has a unique identifier; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        7

      • getItemComponentType

        public int getItemComponentType​(int position)
        Obtains the componentType of the component at the specified position in the provider.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component in the provider.
        Returns:
        Returns the componentType of the component.
        Since:
        7

        Obtains the unique identifier of the component at the specified position in the provider.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns the unique identifier of the component.
        Since:

      • notifyDataCollectionChanged

        public final void notifyDataCollectionChanged​()
        Notifies any registered observer that all components in the provider have been updated.
        Since:
        7

      • notifyUpdatedAt

        public final void notifyUpdatedAt​(int position)
        Notifies any registered observer that the component at the specified position in the provider has been updated.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component that has been updated.
        Since:
        7

      • notifyUpdatedAt

        public final void notifyUpdatedAt​(int position,
                                  Object crab)
        Notifies any registered observer that the component at the specified position in the provider has been updated with a crab object.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component that has been updated.
        crab - Specifies whether it is a partial update. If this parameter is set to null, all the content in ComponentOwner has been updated. If this parameter is not set to null, a partial update is performed on the ComponentOwner, which improves the performance when sliding the ListComponent.
        Since:
        7

      • notifyRangeUpdated

        public final void notifyRangeUpdated​(int positionStart,
                                     int itemCount)
        Notifies any registered observer that a given number of components have been updated from the specified position.
        Parameters:
        positionStart - Indicates the position of the first component that has been updated.
        itemCount - Indicates the number of components that has been updated.
        Since:
        7

      • notifyRangeUpdated

        public final void notifyRangeUpdated​(int positionStart,
                                     int itemCount,
                                     Object crab)
        Notifies any registered observer that a given number of components have been updated from the specified position, with a crab object.
        Parameters:
        positionStart - Indicates the position of the first component that has been updated.
        itemCount - Indicates the number of components that has been updated.
        crab - Specifies whether it is a partial update. If this parameter is set to null, all the content in ComponentOwner has been updated. If this parameter is not set to null, a partial update is performed on the ComponentOwner, which improves the performance when sliding the ListComponent.
        Since:
        7

        public final void notifyInsertedAt​(int position)
        Notifies any registered observer that a component has been inserted to the specified position in the provider.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the component that has been inserted.
        Since:
        7

      • notifyPositionMoved

        public final void notifyPositionMoved​(int fromPosition,
                                      int toPosition)
        Notifies any registered observer that a component has been moved from one position to another in the provider.
        Parameters:
        fromPosition - Indicates the previous position of the component.
        toPosition - Indicates the new position of the component.
        Since:

        public final boolean hasObserversRegistered​()
        Checks whether an observer is registered with the provider.
        Returns:
